name: Smash Room 3D FREE
description:
Smash Room = THE BEST STRESS RELIEF APP!
(Relieve Stress By Breaking Things)
WARNING: Do not try this at home (or in real life).

If you have probably at some point been so frustrated, you felt the need to break something to relieve the tension. Please think of Smash Room!

Smash Room provides virtual 3D environment and objects you need to take out your aggressions with the smashables and become a perfect application for frustrating times: Give you the breakables to fling against walls.

FEATURES:
+ Smash objects by sensitivity simulation.
+ 3 different rooms!
+ 3 objects for breaking!
+ Realistic 3D graphics.
+ Cool sound effects.

Take you stress out by breaking objects!

See game play video: http://www.natenai.com
